intro.title: 1. Introduction
paragraphs: Invoicify ("the App") respects your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection and Usage
paragraphs: 2.1 User Data (CloudKit/iCloud): Your invoices and client info are stored privately in your Apple iCloud via CloudKit. Only you can access this data. We cannot access it.
2.2 Analytics & Crash Reporting (Firebase): We use Google Firebase for basic analytics and crash reports. See Google’s Privacy Policy.
2.3 Subscriptions (StoreKit): Payments are processed by Apple. We do not store payment details. See Apple’s Privacy Policy.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
paragraphs: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties. Data lives on your device and in your iCloud account.

retention.title: 4. Data Retention & Deletion
list: Remove app data from iCloud in Apple settings.
Use “Reset Data” in the app settings.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
list: Right to lodge a complaint with your local authority.
paragraphs: Legal bases: performance of contract (providing the app), legitimate interests (app reliability, fraud prevention), and consent where applicable (e.g., analytics toggles).

changes.title: 6. Changes to this Policy
paragraphs: We may update this policy; the latest version will always be available in the App and on this page.

technical: Storage: Apple CloudKit (private database per Apple ID).
